A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: what a disaster.. this was a blocky stream of plot holes\, shallow character development\, cringy humor\, etc\,. Rian Johnson has destroyed star wars. I should've known when Mark Hamill said that he fundamentally disagrees with what Rian Johnson had done to Luke Skywalker. I mean this movie had such a huge potential for success\, but yet just shat all over it.
